long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learn To Dance Online with Dance Addiction

www.DanceAddiction.ro  helps both children and adults, discover, learn and develop their dancing skills through videos, blog articles and useful tools like mobile applications.

In our opinion “Dancing is not just choreographies, moves, figures and steps. Dancing is an art, it's therapy, it is a lifestyle!” If you have the desire to learn to dance, we can teach you how to start and continue growing your passion.

And our site, YouTube channel and Facebook page aren't just about it's creators Clemy and Adina - are about training and resourcing you to successfully live your passion.
